name: Shatter (itch) (TheGenKo)
description:
You play as Elias, a farmer who left is village to discover an abandonned massive temple. What will he find inside ?

4 Months project with a 15 people team. I worked on this project as a Level Designer.

B to crouch. If you happen to be stuck, press 1 (numpad) to get yourself into a camera mode. Press 1 again to respawn where you are as the character.
